tooltip.tutorialmod.sound_block.tooltip: Makes a sweet sound when right clicked
tooltip.tutorialmod.metal_detector.toolt: Reveals the hidden veins of Iron, the backbone of every adventurerâ€™s tools
tooltip.tutorialmod.diamond_detector.too: Unveils the rarest of gems, where brilliance meets strength
tooltip.tutorialmod.copper_detector.tool: Sniffs out the gleaming copper, prized by those who craft and tinker
tooltip.tutorialmod.gold_detector.toolti: Guides you to the shimmering veins of Gold, coveted by kings and crafters alike
tooltip.tutorialmod.lapis_detector.toolt: Finds the deep azure glow of Lapis, a stone favored by those who seek arcane power
tooltip.tutorialmod.emerald_detector.too: Uncovers the radiant Emerald, a treasure sought by traders and nobles
tooltip.tutorialmod.redstone_detector.to: Tracks the pulsating glow of Redstone, a gift for those who master magic and machines
tooltip.tutorialmod.coal_detector.toolti: Reveals the dark, charred veins of Coal, the lifeblood of every furnace and torch
tooltip.tutorialmod.quartz_detector.tool: Guides you to the gleaming Nether Quartz, a crystal with both beauty and utility
tooltip.tutorialmod.nether_detector.tool: Finds the infernal Gold hidden deep within the Nether, a rare prize of the underworld
tooltip.tutorialmod.netherite_detector.t: Detects the ancient debris of the Nether in any chunk, forged into the strongest material known
tooltip.tutorialmod.ultimate_detector.to: Unveils every hidden ore, from the common to the rare, guiding you to treasures untold
